message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the opportunity to acquire an asset that could potentially increase in value over time. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details with you soon. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.
